tool_description: APIv1 is the old Hummingbird API that is already implemented in multiple applications, its syntax and functionality will surely not change in the future so it is recommended to use this for any long-running projects.
name: Hummingbird APIv1
title: Hummingbird APIv1

api_list.name: Feed
api_list.description: Get the latest posts on a user's feed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com/users/cybrox/feed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com/users/{name}/feed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: User
api_list.description: Get informations about a single user

api_list.name: Library

url = "https://hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com/users/cybrox/library"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for an anime (supports fuzzy search)

api_list.name: Anime
api_list.description: Get information about a single anime
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com/anime/log-horizon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hbrd-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Remove
api_list.description: Remove an anime from a user's library

api_list.name: Authenticate
api_list.description: Authenticate request to get a user's auth-token

api_list.name: Update
api_list.description: Update an entry in a user's library

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: 0.5, 1, 1.5 .... 5. To remove the rating, set this to the same value it already has

optional_parameters.name: notes
optional_parameters.default: That's the best anime ever made!

optional_parameters.name: increment_episodes
optional_parameters.description: Will increment the episodes watched counter by one if set to true
